about.title: About the Foundation
about.intro: Asia's Gift of Hope is a foundation established by Alaa Alamirat, a medical student at Erasmus MC. The foundation is named after his mother Asia, a woman with a heart of gold who volunteered as an interpreter at Refugee Services and always stood ready to help others.
about.mission: Our mission is to provide hope and humanity to vulnerable families in Syria through medical aid, food, and education.

prosthetics.title: Prosthetic Aid
prosthetics.intro: A prosthetic not only restores someone's dignity, but enables people to work and study again.

jana.name: Jana
jana.description: Can now eat and play independently thanks to her hand prosthetic.
jana.imageAlt: Jana with her new hand prosthetic

bikri.name: Bikri
bikri.description: Lost both legs but can now walk again with new prosthetics.
bikri.imageAlt: Bikri with his new leg prosthetics

zakaria.name: Zakaria
zakaria.description: Student who can attend school again thanks to his prosthetic.

prosthetics.impact: More than 14 patients helped with prosthetics

babyFood.title: Baby Food & Diapers
babyFood.text1: Many families in Syria cannot afford baby food or diapers. We help these families by providing essential baby products.
babyFood.text2: A baby we helped was severely malnourished. After two months of nutritional support, the child was healthy and happy again.

foodPackages.title: Food Packages
foodPackages.text1: We buy bread from street vendors - this way we kill two birds with one stone: we help the vendor and the families who receive the bread.
foodPackages.text2: Our food packages contain basic necessities for families who are struggling.

education.title: Education Support
education.text1: Education is the key to a better future. We help students with school supplies and laptops.
education.text2: Mustafa, a motivated student, received a laptop that enables him to continue his studies and pursue his dreams.

aboutAsia.title: About Asia
aboutAsia.text1: The foundation is named after Asia, the mother of founder Alaa. Asia was a woman with a heart of gold who always stood ready to help others.
aboutAsia.text2: As a volunteer, she interpreted at Refugee Services and helped countless people. Her memory lives on in the work of this foundation.
aboutAsia.quote: Behind the tears of sorrow hides the smile of remembrance

cta.title: Help us bring hope
cta.text: With your donation, we can help more people with prosthetics, food, and education. Every contribution makes a difference.
